tool_description: Search all City, State, Country, and postoffice by pincode, INDIA
name: Pincode
title: Pincode

api_list.name: Find By Pincode
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pincode13.p.rapidapi.com/415612"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pincode13.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pincode13.p.rapidapi.com/{pincode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pincode13.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
